title: Product Header With Main Navigation
reference-overview: The Product Header With Static Navigation is one of the default product headers offered in Evolution. This version contains a static gray main navigation bar that displays immediately below the blue product identifier background.
reference-usage: This version of a product header should be used when it is important to provide a consistent main navigation option that is displayed on every screen, and when the number of main navigation options is manageble number (less than 7 or so).
reference-details:
This header is comprised of the following sections:

Product Identifier

  • This is the first bar across the top that contains the dark blue to light blue gradient.
  • It contains the product name, which is always displayed in CAPS, with the first part offset by a bolder display.
  • There is also an optional "User Identifier" menu control that can be turned on or off.

Main Navigation

  • This gray bar with the light gray to dark gray gradient also spans the width of the screen.
  • It contains all of the main navigation sections (as defined by the specific project needs).
  • Each navigation "tab" has a hover state on desktop version to provide user feedback.
reference-mobile:
This product header version is built responsively, and when the breakpoint is reached, the following will happen:

  • The "User Identifier" control will drop off and will not display.
  • Each navigation "tab" will stack on top of the other, on a separate line
  • The product name text size will decrease.
  • The "tab" text size will increase.
